subject: Über das Coden & Testen
front:
![ ](https://arsnova-uploads.mni.thm.de/unknown_man.jpg width=250px) > "
Why do most developers fear to make continuous changes to their code?
They are afraid they’ll break it!

Why are they afraid they’ll break it?
Because they don’t have tests.
" > -- Wer wird hier zitiert?
back:
!["Uncle Bob" [(Bildquelle)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_C._Martin)](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ee/Robert_Cecil_Martin.png/378px-Robert_Cecil_Martin.png width=250) > "
Why do most developers fear to make continuous changes to their code?
They are afraid they’ll break it!

Why are they afraid they’ll break it?
Because they don’t have tests.
" > -- Robert Cecil Martin
hint:
![Für Informatiker ein "Must Read"](https://images.gr-assets.com/books/1347470803l/10284614.jpg width=240px) Robert C. Martin:
**The Clean Coder. A Code of Conduct for Professional Programmers.**
Prentice Hall: Upper Saddle River NJ u. a. 2011. (S. 15). * Zum Begriff "clean code": https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clean_Code * Über den Autor: https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Cecil_Martin
